verses.verse: Also, thou <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> unto <WH413> the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> and say, <WH559> Ye mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> the enemy <WH341> hath said <WH559> against <WH5921> you, Aha, <WH1889> even the ancient <WH5769> high places <WH1116> are <WH1961> ours in possession: <WH4181>

Therefore <WH3651> prophesy <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> <WH3282> they have made you desolate, <WH8074> and swallowed you up <WH7602> <WH853> on every side, <WH4480> <WH5439> that ye might be <WH1961> a possession <WH4181> unto the residue <WH7611> of the heathen, <WH1471> and ye are taken up <WH5927> in <WH5921> the lips <WH8193> of talkers, <WH3956> and are an infamy <WH1681> of the people: <WH5971>

Therefore, <WH3651> ye mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> to the mountains, <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the rivers, <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> to the desolate <WH8074> wastes, <WH2723> and to the cities <WH5892> that are forsaken, <WH5800> which <WH834> became <WH1961> a prey <WH957> and derision <WH3933> to the residue <WH7611> of the heathen <WH1471> that <WH834> are round about; <WH4480> <WH5439>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> in the fire <WH784> of my jealousy <WH7068> have I spoken <WH1696> against <WH5921> the residue <WH7611> of the heathen, <WH1471> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> Idumea, <WH123> which <WH834> have appointed <WH5414> <WH853> my land <WH776> into their possession <WH4181> with the joy <WH8057> of all <WH3605> their heart, <WH3824> with despiteful <WH7589> minds, <WH5315> to <WH4616> cast it out <WH1644> for a prey. <WH957>

Prophesy <WH5012> therefore <WH3651> concerning <WH5921> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto the mountains, <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the rivers, <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I have spoken <WH1696> in my jealousy <WH7068> and in my fury, <WH2534> because <WH3282> ye have borne <WH5375> the shame <WH3639> of the heathen: <WH1471>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I <WH589> have lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> mine hand, <WH3027> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> the heathen <WH1471> that <WH834> are about <WH4480> <WH5439> you, they <WH1992> shall bear <WH5375> their shame. <WH3639>

But ye, <WH859> O mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> ye shall shoot forth <WH5414> your branches, <WH6057> and yield <WH5375> your fruit <WH6529> to my people <WH5971> of Israel; <WH3478> for <WH3588> they are at hand <WH7126> to come. <WH935>
For, <WH3588> behold, <WH2009> I am for <WH413> you, and I will turn <WH6437> unto <WH413> you, and ye shall be tilled <WH5647> and sown: <WH2232>

And I will multiply <WH7235> men <WH120> upon <WH5921> you, all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> even all <WH3605> of it: and the cities <WH5892> shall be inhabited, <WH3427> and the wastes <WH2723> shall be built: <WH1129>

And I will multiply <WH7235> upon <WH5921> you man <WH120> and beast; <WH929> and they shall increase <WH7235> and bring fruit: <WH6509> and I will settle <WH3427> you after your old estates, <WH6927> and will do better <WH3190> unto you than at your beginnings: <WH4480> <WH7221> and ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>

Yea, I will cause men <WH120> to walk <WH1980> upon <WH5921> you, even <WH853> my people <WH5971> Israel; <WH3478> and they shall possess <WH3423> thee, and thou shalt be <WH1961> their inheritance, <WH5159> and thou shalt no <WH3808> more <WH3254> henceforth <WH5750> bereave <WH7921> them of men.

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> they say <WH559> unto you, Thou <WH859> land devourest up <WH398> men, <WH120> and hast bereaved <WH1961> <WH7921> thy nations; <WH1471>

Therefore <WH3651> thou shalt devour <WH398> men <WH120> no <WH3808> more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> bereave <WH7921> thy nations <WH1471> any more, <WH5750> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Neither <WH3808> will I cause men to hear <WH8085> in <WH413> thee the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471> any more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> shalt thou bear <WH5375> the reproach <WH2781> of the people <WH5971> any more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> shalt thou cause thy nations <WH1471> to fall <WH3782> any more, <WH5750> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> when the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in <WH5921> their own land, <WH127> they defiled <WH2930> it by their own way <WH1870> and by their doings: <WH5949> their way <WH1870> was <WH1961> before <WH6440> me as the uncleanness <WH2932> of a removed woman. <WH5079>

Wherefore I poured <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon <WH5921> them for <WH5921> the blood <WH1818> that <WH834> they had shed <WH8210> upon <WH5921> the land, <WH776> and for their idols <WH1544> wherewith they had polluted <WH2930> it:

And I scattered <WH6327> them among the heathen, <WH1471> and they were dispersed <WH2219> through the countries: <WH776> according to their way <WH1870> and according to their doings <WH5949> I judged <WH8199> them.

And when they entered <WH935> unto <WH413> the heathen, <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they went, <WH935> they profaned <WH2490> <WH853> my holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> when they said <WH559> to them, These <WH428> are the people <WH5971> of the LORD, <WH3068> and are gone forth <WH3318> out of his land. <WH4480> <WH776>

But I had pity <WH2550> for <WH5921> mine holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> which <WH834> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> had profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they went. <WH935>

Therefore <WH3651> say <WH559> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I <WH589> do <WH6213> not <WH3808> this for your sakes, <WH4616> O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> but <WH3588> <WH518> for mine holy <WH6944> name's <WH8034> sake, which <WH834> ye have profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> ye went. <WH935>

And I will sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> my great <WH1419> name, <WH8034> which was profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> which <WH834> ye have profaned <WH2490> in the midst <WH8432> of them; and the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> when I shall be sanctified <WH6942> in you before their eyes. <WH5869>

For I will take <WH3947> you from among <WH4480> the heathen, <WH1471> and gather <WH6908> you out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> countries, <WH776> and will bring <WH935> you into <WH413> your own land. <WH127>

Then will I sprinkle <WH2236> clean <WH2889> water <WH4325> upon <WH5921> you, and ye shall be clean: <WH2891> from all <WH4480> <WH3605> your filthiness, <WH2932> and from all <WH4480> <WH3605> your idols, <WH1544> will I cleanse <WH2891> you.

A new <WH2319> heart <WH3820> also will I give <WH5414> you, and a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> will I put <WH5414> within <WH7130> you: and I will take away <WH5493> <WH853> the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of your flesh, <WH4480> <WH1320> and I will give <WH5414> you a heart <WH3820> of flesh. <WH1320>

And I will put <WH5414> my spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you, and cause <WH6213> you to walk <WH1980> in <WH854> my statutes, <WH2706> and ye shall keep <WH8104> my judgments, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them.
And ye shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> that <WH834> I gave <WH5414> to your fathers; <WH1> and ye shall be <WH1961> my people, <WH5971> and I <WH595> will be <WH1961> your God. <WH430>

I will also save <WH3467> you from all <WH4480> <WH3605> your uncleannesses: <WH2932> and I will call <WH7121> for <WH413> the corn, <WH1715> and will increase <WH7235> it, and lay <WH5414> no <WH3808> famine <WH7458> upon <WH5921> you.

And I will multiply <WH7235> <WH853> the fruit <WH6529> of the tree, <WH6086> and the increase <WH8570> of the field, <WH7704> that <WH4616> <WH834> ye shall receive <WH3947> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> reproach <WH2781> of famine <WH7458> among the heathen. <WH1471>

Then shall ye remember <WH2142> <WH853> your own evil <WH7451> ways, <WH1870> and your doings <WH4611> that <WH834> were not <WH3808> good, <WH2896> and shall loathe yourselves <WH6962> in your own sight <WH6440> for <WH5921> your iniquities <WH5771> and for <WH5921> your abominations. <WH8441>

Not <WH3808> for your sakes <WH4616> do <WH6213> I <WH589> this, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> be it known <WH3045> unto you: be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH3637> for your own ways, <WH4480> <WH1870> O house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> In the day <WH3117> that I shall have cleansed <WH2891> you from all <WH4480> <WH3605> your iniquities <WH5771> I will also cause you to dwell <WH3427> <WH853> in the cities, <WH5892> and the wastes <WH2723> shall be built. <WH1129>
And the desolate <WH8074> land <WH776> shall be tilled, <WH5647> whereas <WH8478> <WH834> it lay <WH1961> desolate <WH8077> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> that passed by. <WH5674>

And they shall say, <WH559> This <WH1977> land <WH776> that was desolate <WH8074> is become <WH1961> like the garden <WH1588> of Eden; <WH5731> and the waste <WH2720> and desolate <WH8074> and ruined <WH2040> cities <WH5892> are become fenced, <WH1219> and are inhabited. <WH3427>

Then the heathen <WH1471> that <WH834> are left <WH7604> round about <WH5439> you shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> build <WH1129> the ruined <WH2040> places, and plant <WH5193> that that was desolate: <WH8074> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it, and I will do <WH6213> it.

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will yet <WH5750> for this <WH2063> be inquired of <WH1875> by the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> to do <WH6213> it for them; I will increase <WH7235> them with men <WH120> like a flock. <WH6629>

As the holy <WH6944> flock, <WH6629> as the flock <WH6629> of Jerusalem <WH3389> in her solemn feasts; <WH4150> so <WH3651> shall the waste <WH2720> cities <WH5892> be <WH1961> filled <WH4392> with flocks <WH6629> of men: <WH120> and they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>
